title: Deactivate a Customer Account
description: A retailer has stopped doing business with the wholesaler. An agent needs to deactivate their account.

tasks.description: Identify the customer account to be deactivated.
Verify that there are no outstanding orders or invoices on the account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the account has a zero balance.

tasks.description: Deactivate the customer account in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully marks the account as inactive.
